guide.title: Response Guide
guide.beHonest: Be honest and clear in your responses!
guide.pleaseDesc: Use only for something you <u>really want</u>. This will create priorities in the report!
guide.yupDesc: I'm open, I'd like to try it.
guide.mehDesc: Not interested or I don't feel comfortable. These questions <u>won't appear</u> in the report, EXCEPT if your partner answers "Please!" (for couple reflection).
guide.maybeDesc: I need to think about it, I'm not sure.

tutorial.title: How Quest4Couple Works
tutorial.subtitle: Complete guide to discover each other

intro.title: What is Quest4Couple?
intro.description: Quest4Couple is an interactive tool for couples to discover compatibilities, desires and fantasies in a private, secure and fun way.
intro.step1Desc: Each person answers the questionnaires individually and privately, without seeing their partner's answers.
intro.step2Desc: Exchange an access code or files to compare answers.
intro.step3Desc: The system compares answers and reveals only what both are interested in!
intro.privacyDesc: Answers are encrypted and only you have access. Not even we can see what you answer!

register.title: Why Register?
register.warningTitle: You can VIEW without registration, but you CAN'T ANSWER
register.warningDesc: Registration is 100% free and allows you to save your answers securely in the cloud.
register.benefit1Desc: Answer on PC, mobile, or tablet - automatically synced!
register.benefit2Desc: Generate a unique code for your partner to access your answers.
register.benefit3Desc: Never lose your answers - everything saved in the cloud!
register.noRegisterDesc: You can answer locally and export .q4c files, but you'll lose:
register.securityDesc: Your email and password are protected by Google's Firebase Authentication. Answers are stored encrypted.

answers.title: How to Answer
answers.optionsDesc: Each question has 4 options to answer:
answers.commentsDesc: You can add a comment to each answer to better explain what you think. This helps with comparison!
answers.autosaveDesc: If you're logged in, each answer is saved automatically:
answers.instantDesc: When you click Yes/Maybe/No/Block, the answer is saved instantly to Firestore.
answers.delayDesc: Comments are saved 1 second after you stop typing (debounce).
answers.progressDesc: The progress bar and dashboard are updated automatically.
answers.tip1: Be honest - only you and your partner see
answers.tip4: There are no right or wrong answers

save.title: Save & Load
save.intro: There are 2 ways to save your answers:
save.cloudDesc: If you're logged in, answers are saved automatically to Firebase. You don't need to do anything!
save.localDesc: If you prefer, you can export answers to a file:
save.step1Desc: At the bottom of the questionnaire page.
save.step2Desc: Enter a code to encrypt the file. Keep it safe!
save.step3Desc: A .q4c file is downloaded to your computer.
save.load1Desc: At the top of the questionnaire page.
save.load3Desc: Type the same security code used to save.
save.importantDesc: Keep the code in a safe place! Without it, you cannot decrypt the file.
save.autoSaveDesc: If you have an account, everything is saved automatically after each answer!
save.localSaveDesc: Click 'Save Answers' to download a .q4c file with your encrypted answers.

custom.title: Custom Questions
custom.description: You can create your own questions to add to existing packs!
custom.step1Desc: Open the pack where you want to add (e.g., Romantic).
custom.step2Desc: At the end of each category.
custom.exportImportDesc: You can share your custom questions with your partner:
custom.exportDesc: Click "üì§ Export Custom" to generate a JSON file.
custom.importDesc: Partner clicks "üì• Import Custom" and selects the file.
custom.tipDesc: It's important that both import custom questions for them to appear in the comparison!
custom.example1: Would you like to try a romantic getaway?
custom.example2: Are you curious about exploring roleplay fantasies?
custom.example3: Do you want to discuss limits and boundaries?

connections.title: Connection System
connections.description: The connection system allows you and your partner to connect securely to compare answers. Now with connection requests that need to be accepted!
connections.securityDesc: Now, when someone sends a connection request, you need to accept it first before you can see each other's answers. This ensures nobody can access your answers without authorization!
connections.send1Desc: Access the Dashboard or Report page where you can manage connections.
connections.send2Desc: Find the button to add a new partner.
connections.send4Desc: Partner will receive a notification with the pending request.
connections.receive1Desc: When you receive a request, a red badge appears in the menu and a "Connection Requests" section in Dashboard and Report.
connections.receive2Desc: Click the "‚úÖ Accept" button to establish the connection. From this point, you can compare answers!
connections.receive3Desc: Click the "‚ùå Reject" button if you don't recognize the person or don't want to connect.
connections.deleteDesc: If you need to remove an existing connection:
connections.delete1Desc: In Dashboard or Report, find the list of connected partners.
connections.delete2Desc: Each connection has a remove button.
connections.delete3Desc: For security, you need to confirm twice before deleting.
connections.noteDesc: When deleting a connection, the other user can no longer see your answers. You can always reconnect later with a new request.
connections.notificationsDesc: Quest4Couple has a notification badge system to keep you informed:
connections.greenBadgeDesc: Your partner has new answers in the questionnaire!
connections.redBadgeDesc: There are new connection requests or report updates!
connections.privacyDesc: Your answers are only visible to partners with accepted connection. Pending or rejected requests cannot access your answers!

compare.title: Answer Comparison
compare.description: The magic of Quest4Couple is in the comparison! The system shows only what both are interested in.
compare.matrixDesc: The system compares answers using a compatibility matrix. The more you agree, the better the match!
compare.privacyDesc: The system only shows results when there's some compatibility. If there's doubt or low interest, privacy is maintained!
compare.step3Desc: With code it's easier, but files also work.
compare.step4Desc: The system generates a beautiful report with matches!

code.title: Access Code System
code.description: The access code allows comparing answers without sharing files!
code.howItWorksDesc: Each one has a unique code generated automatically when creating an account.
code.step1Desc: In the Dashboard, copy your code.
code.step3Desc: In Dashboard: "Add Partner" ‚Üí Enter code ‚Üí Send request.
code.step4Desc: You receive the request and click "Accept".
code.newFeatureDesc: Now requests need to be accepted before the connection is established. See more details in the ü§ù Connections section.
code.recommendationDesc: Use code if both have accounts - much easier and safer! Use file if you prefer total privacy.
code.securityDesc: Unique and random code. Requests need to be accepted before viewing answers. Can delete connections anytime!
code.whereDesc: In the Dashboard, under 'My Access Code' - share with your partner!

banner.description: Quest4Couple is 100% free, but developing and maintaining it requires time and costs. If you liked it, consider supporting us in one of these ways:

beta.title: Beta Version ‚Ä¢ Under Development
beta.description: We're in testing phase! If you find bugs or have suggestions, send us feedback and help improve üí™

cloud.fastHint: ‚ö° Fast and no security code needed!

about.title: About Quest4Couple
about.intro: Quest4Couple was born from a real need: helping couples communicate openly about desires, fantasies, and affinities in a safe, judgment-free way.
about.missionText: We want all couples to feel free to explore their intimacy without fear, shame, or discomfort. Through carefully crafted questionnaires, we facilitate conversations that many find difficult to start.
about.privacyText: Your privacy is sacred. We don't sell data, we don't share information, and everything you answer stays between you. Simple as that.
about.howItWorks1: Choose one of the 5 thematic packs (or do them all!)
about.howItWorks2: Each person answers the questions individually
about.howItWorks3: See only what you have in common
about.futureText: We're just getting started! We want to add more features, more content, and become the go-to tool for couples who want to grow together.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! Currently, all Quest4Couple content is free. In the future, we may add optional premium features, but the core service will remain accessible to everyone.
faq.a2: Absolutely! Your answers are stored locally in your browser. We don't sell data, we don't share information with third parties, and we have no access to what you answer. Your privacy is our #1 priority.
faq.a3: Each person answers the questionnaire individually. In the end, you only see what you have in common - answers where both said "yes". If one says "no", that question doesn't appear in the final result.
faq.a4Pack1: Romantic Pack - 40 questions about sensuality and connection
faq.a4Pack2: Exploration & Adventure - 30 questions about trying new things
faq.a4Pack3: Spicy - 32 questions to spice up the relationship
faq.a4Pack5: Fetishes - 100 questions about kinks and advanced practices
faq.q5: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a5: Currently, yes. Creating an account lets you save your answers, compare results with your partner, and access history. But don't worry - we only ask for the essentials (email and password).
faq.q6: Can I do the questionnaires alone?
faq.a6: Yes! You can do the questionnaires alone to explore your own desires. But the magic happens when you compare results with your partner!
faq.q7: How can I support the project?
faq.a7: We love support! You can make a donation, share feedback, or simply recommend us to other couples. Check out the Support the Project page for more details.
faq.q8: Do you have a mobile app?
faq.a8: Not yet, but the site is fully responsive and works perfectly on phones! A native app may come in the future.
faq.q9: I still have questions, how can I contact you?
faq.a9: Have more questions? Send an email to info@quest4couple.pt and we'll be happy to help! üíï

support.title: Support the Project
support.intro: Quest4Couple is a passion project created to help couples discover each other safely and without judgment. Currently, all content is free.
support.transparencyText: We're in an early stage and want to grow sustainably. Your support helps us:
support.transparency1: Keep the service online and private
support.coffeeText: A small gesture of support that motivates us to continue. Any amount is welcome!
support.paypalText: Secure support via PayPal. Accepts credit and debit cards.
support.feedbackText: Your opinion is valuable! Tell us what works, what doesn't, and what you'd like to see.
support.feedbackEmailHint: Only if you want a response
support.feedbackMessagePlaceholder: Share your opinion, suggestion, or experience...
support.feedbackSuccess: ‚úÖ Thank you for your feedback! We'll read it carefully.
support.shareText: Recommend us to other couples who might benefit. Word of mouth is the best way to grow!
support.noteText: No donation is required. Quest4Couple will remain free during this initial phase. In the future, we may introduce optional premium features, but the core service will always remain accessible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1Text: Our users' privacy is absolutely fundamental. This policy explains how we handle (or rather, how we DON'T handle) your data.
privacy.s2Text: We collect the absolute minimum necessary for the service to work:
privacy.s2Item1: Email: To create an account and recover password
privacy.s2Item2: Questionnaire answers: Stored locally in your browser
privacy.s2Item3: Basic browsing data: To improve site experience
privacy.s3Text: Your data is used ONLY for:
privacy.s4Item1: Sell or share your data with third parties
privacy.s4Item2: Use your data for targeted advertising
privacy.s5Text: Your questionnaire answers are stored locally in your browser using localStorage. This means:
privacy.s5Item1: We don't have direct access to your answers
privacy.s5Item3: If you clear browser history, answers are deleted
privacy.s6Text: We use HTTPS encryption for all communications. Passwords are encrypted and never stored in plain text.
privacy.s7Text: According to GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy.s7Item3: Delete your account and all data
privacy.s8Text: We use essential cookies for site functionality (e.g., keeping session active). We don't use tracking or advertising cookies.
privacy.s9Text: We may update this policy occasionally. We'll always notify about significant changes through registered email.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.s1Text: By using Quest4Couple, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, please don't use the service.
terms.s2Text: You must be at least 18 years old to use Quest4Couple. By creating an account, you confirm you are of legal age.
terms.s3Text: You agree to use the service responsibly and legally. You may NOT:
terms.s3Item2: Use the service to harass or harm others
terms.s3Item3: Attempt to hack or compromise site security
terms.s4Text: You are responsible for keeping your account secure. Don't share your password and notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access.
terms.s5Text: Your questionnaire answers are yours. You retain all rights to content you create. We don't claim ownership over your answers.
terms.s6Text: We do our best to keep the service available 24/7, but we don't guarantee 100% uptime. We may have scheduled maintenance or occasional interruptions.
terms.s7Text: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the service at any time. We'll always try to notify in advance about significant changes.
terms.s8Text: Currently, Quest4Couple is free. We accept voluntary donations, but no payment is required. In the future, we may introduce optional premium features.
terms.s9Text: Quest4Couple is provided "as is". We are not responsible for:
terms.s9Item1: Relationship problems resulting from using the service
terms.s9Item2: Data loss due to technical failures
terms.s9Item3: Decisions made based on questionnaire results
terms.s9Important: Important: Quest4Couple is not professional advice. For serious relationship issues, consult a qualified therapist.
terms.s10Text: You may delete your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms.s11Text: These terms are governed by the laws of Portugal. Any dispute will be resolved in Portuguese courts.
